name: B-FAST!
description:
You're a bee. AND YOU' RE FAST! DAMN FAST! SO FAST THAT NO ONE CAN CATCH UP WITH YOU! (At least a bee couldn't catch up with you).

Maneuver through many obstacles and try to stay alive!

Made for the Weekly Game Jam - Jam 14

A Game by:

  • Korbinian Maag
  • Hannah Schwegler
  • Sait Demirsoy
